ARABIC: وَلَئِن مُّتُّمْ أَوْ قُتِلْتُمْ لَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُحْشَرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If you die or you are killed, it is to Allah that you will be gathered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And if you die or are killed, even so it is to God that you will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And were you to die or be slain, it is to Allah that you will all be mustered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If you die or are slain, certainly you will all be brought before God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And whether you are killed or you die, towards Allah you will be gathered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And whether you die or are killed, verily, unto Allah you shall be gathered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if indeed you die or you are slain, certainly to Allah shall you be gathered together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: surely if you die or are slain, it is unto God you shall be mustered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: What though ye be slain or die, when unto Allah ye are gathered?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: For, indeed, if you die or are killed, it is to God that you shall be gathered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And whether ye die or be slain, assuredly unto Allah shall ye be gathered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: If you die or are slain, you will surely be mustered toward Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And if ye die, or are slain, Lo! it is unto Allah that ye are brought together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And whether you die, or are killed, verily, unto Allah you shall be gathered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And if you die or are killed, before Allah you shall all be gathered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: If you die, or are killed—to God you will be gathered up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And whether you die or are killed, unto Allah you will be gathered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:158] And if (wa-la-in, the lām is for oaths) you die ([read] in both ways [muttum or mittum], or are slain, in the [holy] struggle or otherwise, it is to God, and to none other than Him that, you shall be mustered, in the Hereafter, and He will requite you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (What though ye be slain) on a journey or in settlement (or die) in a fighting expedition, (when unto Allah you are gathered?) after you die.
